title.narrative: Women and Science in the International Year of Light 2015

description.narrative: The overall project objective is to recognize and value the contributions of women in the scientific theories that are commemorated during the International Year of Light 2015 to support the participation of young female students in the sciences.The direct beneficiaries of the project are 60 elementary school students (5th - 8th grade), 60 high school students (1st - 4th grade), 15 teachers of basic education and 15 teachers of secondary education. Indirect recipients will be approximately 1000 elementary s chool students and 1000 high school students and 200 teachers in the school system.To achieve this objective the following specific objectives will be executed:? Improve public understanding of what has been the role and contribution of women to scientific activity particularly related to themes about the nature of light? Develop activities in the educational context aimed at the dissemination of the contributions of women scientists in the framework of the International Year of the Light.? Encourage the pa rticipation of young female students in scientific research projects and improving scientific attitudes.
